remarks: The quotient of a polynomial ` F ` by a monic monomial of same degree ` G ` converges to the highest coefficient of ` F ` .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-Sep-2018.)
statement:
signsply0.d $e |- D = ( deg ` F ) $.
signsply0.c $e |- C = ( coeff ` F ) $.
signsply0.b $e |- B = ( C ` D ) $.
signsplypnf.g $e |- G = ( x e. RR+ |-> ( x ^ D ) ) $.
signsplypnf $p |- ( F e. ( Poly ` RR ) -> ( F oF / G ) ~~>r B ) $.
$d C x $.
$d D x $.
$d F x $.
$d G x $.
